title: Brent Schlender and Rick Tetzeli: Meet the Author
itunes:author: Apple
itunes:subtitle: Becoming Steve Jobs
itunes:summary: Co-authors Brent Schlender and Rick Tetzeli talk about their book Becoming Steve Jobs. The book sheds new light on the colorful and compelling figure who became one of the most famous CEOs in history. Moderated by John Gruber of Daring Fireball. Becoming Steve Jobs is available on iBooks .
